page.title: 13PLAYGROUND GAMES-3
page.content: One Way. This game can only be played if there is a netball court marked out on the playground. There are two homes, either side of the court. About six people play, one of whom is the catcher. The catcher runs one way round the lines of the netball court. Anybody coming on a line towards the catcher is caught. Kickball. This game is very like Rounders, except that whoever is in kicks the ball before attempting to run round the playground. The fielders try to stump a skittle to prevent any score. Other games played are Football, Skipping and Hopscotch. Chase is also called It and Tag. Some children prefer to be quiet at playtimes: they can sit on the benches if they want to.
